name: Necropolis (itch) (Sage7, mhm32167)
description:
Necropolis is an RPG platformer. Lenore has returned from her travels to find her home town deserted. What happened? To find out, and defeat her foes, she must change herself and become what she despises...

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #25 (September 2020). Theme: Change yourself, change the world.  Sound, art and code were made within the jam's time frame.

Made using the Godot engine, by:
SarahSsss7#9089,
Sophiablabla#7563
hnuqweasd#3731
